text: Hadleigh Heath is a hamlet in Polstead, Babergh, Suffolk, England. A chapel was built in 1823, it was removed to Polstead in 1849. It also has one listed building called Evans Hall. == References == == Other websites == * http://www.genuki.org.uk/cgi- bin/churchentry?CCC=SFK,ID=10669,FT=Polstead%20Chapel%20Evans%20Heath- Hadleigh%20Heath%20General%20Baptist Category:Settlements in Babergh Category:Hamlets in Suffolk
title: Hadleigh Heath
